en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can say tell me what is missing, or, you can say exit... What can I help you with?

en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: The Missing Object skill can't help you with that.  It can help you find what is missing if you say tell me what is missing. What can I help you with?
